details: CS & DS Focuses: Machine Learning and Natural Language Processing
Mathematics Focuses: Financial Mathematics and Risk Management
Student representative for computer science students in the ADP program.
Researched and developed language model-driven solutions, enhancing data classification accuracy and effectiveness.
Conducted error analysis and applied data cleaning, improving model reliability and outcomes.
Initiated data augmentation techniques, achieving performance gains that supported key objectives.

research_experience.organization: The Fields Institute for Research in Mathematical Sciences, Canada
details: Research focus: Multilingual NLP for low-resource languages, emphasizing the intersection of mathematics, social science, and machine learning.
Conducted studies on linguistic data integrity and reproducibility in typological databases.
Performed regression analysis to explore influential factors on machine translation performance.
Research focus: Mathematics education in undergraduate settings, focusing on the use of Open Software and Textbook.
Collaborated with other members of the research team to develop open-source interactive textbooks that better support the teaching and learning of Calculus, Linear Algebra, and Abstract Algebra.

Analyzed students' reasoning in answering reading questions embedded in an interactive Linear Algebra textbook using APOS Theory, Balacheff's model of conceptions, Sfrad's model of commognition, and polysemous approach.
